(Did they ask Terrorsaur or Phobia to lead?)

"You do whats the best for all in your group, my dear that is what 
makes you the ideal leader." again he emphasised the word 
leader " "You can lead, all you need to do is show a little force." 
most Predacons knew the basic rules of leadership "Never look down on 
a subordinate, lowering your head shows weekness. Never contradict 
your own orders, Know your teams functions and capabilities, and most 
of all Never turn your back after a defeat, theres always someone 
looking for that oppertunity." He thought about the Irony of the 
situation Megatron nearly got everyone killed and now they're having 
this discussion.

"Megatrons told you you're nothing so many times you believe it, it's 
basic psychological breeding." Another irony crossed his mind, a 
Psychological warfare specialist telling a Predacon not to listen to 
psychological warfare. "With the Iron Fist at your controls would 
Megatron challenge you or cringe before you?" he shifted his weight 
to the other foot "And when you destroy the Cybertronian Fire would 
anyone question your abilities?

"You have a choice to Make KitKat, would you rather live trying to 
improve the Predacons? or die as a pawn to Megatron? Only one choice 
gives you a chance at survival." Inside Phobia thought that they both 
knew the answer but just in case he added "Besides Megatron and his 
army have been deemed as expendable acording to the council, Do you 
believe you belong on that list too?"

 
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> "Thank you Phobia,"she said in a low tone,"but I heard them ask 
> Terrorsaur to lead them. I can not lead if others do not wish to 
> follow." She walked to her bed and sat down with her head hung down.
> "And no one saw me,except maybe you." She sighed, "I just don't 
know 
> what's wrong with me.  I'm no leader.  I just do what I think is 
good 
> for me and the team.  Megatron is the real leader of our group.  
he's 
> the one who is programmed for it. I'm....I'm just a soldier and 
> nothing more.  I've followed leaders to the inferno and back.  But  
> lead by different means.  I care about the group I'm in.  I haven't 
> seen another leader do that before." she sighs "And even if I could 
> take over the ship, there is always the chance Megatron would label 
> me a traitor and kill me, take the ship anyway and I'd be dead."  
She 
> layed back on the bed and put her hands behind her head. "Sometimes 
I 
> wonder if I'm even Predacon material."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobia met her at her room looking at the way she carried 
> > herself. "Pick your head up, you can't let the troops see an 
unsure 
> > leader now can we?" he intended to keep pushing the word into her 
> > head until she was convinced. KitKat was the best candidate for 
the 
> > job since Darkmouse had disappeared. "You command well, you 
handled 
> > things devinely back there, you should be proud." The last part 
> he'd 
> > meant he was impressed.
> >
